price: "Mengapa kamu mendatangi laki-laki untuk (memenuhi) nafsu(mu), bukan (mendatangi) wanita? Sebenarnya, kamu adalah kaum yang tidak mengetahui (akibat perbuatanmu)".
arabic: أَئِنَّكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهۡوَةٗ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ تَجۡهَلُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: a-innakum latatūna al-rijāla shahwatan min dūni al-nisāi bal antum qawmun tajhalūna
